    • Method Detail

      • findJsonSpec

        public static java.util.Set<java.nio.file.Path> findJsonSpec(java.nio.file.FileSystem fileSystem,
                                                             java.lang.String optionalPathPrefix,
                                                             java.lang.String path)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the json files found within the directory provided as argument. Files are looked up in the classpath, or optionally from fileSystem if its not null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findYamlSuites

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.nio.file.Path>> findYamlSuites(java.nio.file.FileSystem fileSystem,
                                                                                               java.lang.String optionalPathPrefix,
                                                                                               java.lang.String... paths)
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the yaml files found within the paths provided. Each input path can either be a single file (the .yaml suffix is optional) or a directory. Each path is looked up in the classpath, or optionally from fileSystem if its not null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
